summary: This is a set of animation from different mods, selected to suit my race.
descriptionHtml:
A combination of existing animation mods, that I selected to suit my own race.

This set contain the following:
-Some animations for magic from the mod "New Animation Magic Casting (xp32)"
-Some animations from "Hovering Animation"
-The Sprinting animation for "KISS - Khajiit Cat Sprint and Sneak "
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The animations where switch from place to suit my likes, making the following changes:
-Replace the original magic sprint for khajiit sprint.
-Most of magic animation stand and movement, for my own selection of animation from "New Animation Magic Casting" mod.
-Sneak animation, for the hovering animation.
-The normal sprinting, for hovering sprint.

Note: Not published until all authors give permission.
author: Alex
